info.name: Extension 1 - Uniswap V3 DEX Queries
info.description: GraphQL queries for Extension 1: 100 pools, 100 pools (high liquidity, past week), USDC/WETH pool. Set variable `api_key` in collection.

body.raw: {"query": "{ pools(first: 100) { id token0 { id symbol } token1 { id symbol } } }"}

item.name: Q3 - 100 pools, highest liquidity, created past week

body.raw: {"query": "{ pools(first: 100, orderBy: totalValueLockedUSD, orderDirection: desc, where: { createdAtTimestamp_gte: \"1738800000\" }) { id token0 { id symbol } token1 { id symbol } } }"}
